sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import "./invitealert.css" import { Heading, Text } from "grommet" import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" const INVITE_TEXT = "Copy the link from below or from your URL bar:" const INVITE_HEADER = "Joining Info" function InviteAlert() { const location = useLocation() const invitePath = location.pathname const inviteDomain = window.location return (
{INVITE_HEADER} {INVITE_TEXT}
{inviteDomain}
) } export default InviteAlert;
